page.title: 14HOLIDAY HOMES
page.content: The Richards own a holiday home,they advertise through an agency called Summer cottages,they say that the main attraction is being in the middle of Somerset near Street,Glastambury and Chedder.The holiday home has been there for about four years.Most people come here between Easter and September.Young and old people stay for one to two weeks or more.The holiday home is a house which accomodates twelve adults and two childrens cots but pets are not allowed.Approximately two hundred and fifty people stay a year,the majority of people come from the British Isles although,Americans,Dutch and Germans stay.They also own a shop which is a Post Office and it is right next to the holiday home.
